CarbonControllerUpdated(address).details: triggered when updating the address of the carbonController contract

burn(uint256).details: destorys the voucher token for the given strategyId requirements: - the caller must be the carbonController contract

mint(address,uint256).details: creatds a new voucher token for the given strategyId, transfers it to the provider requirements: - the caller must be the carbonController contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBaseExtension(string).details: sets the base extension requirements: - the caller must be the owner of this contract

setBaseURI(string).details: sets the base URI requirements: - the caller must be the owner of this contract

setCarbonController(address).details: stores the carbonController address requirements: - the caller must be the owner of this contract

tokenURI(uint256).details: depending on the useGlobalURI flag, returns a unique URI point to a json representing the voucher, or a URI of a global json used for all tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

useGlobalURI(bool).details: sets the useGlobalURI flag requirements: - the caller must be the owner of this contract
